Modern Apartment In Bauhaus Style

Bergen-Enkheim, HE 60388, Frankfurt am Main
Description

This chic 3 Bedroom flat in a modern architect's house was designed with a great deal of taste and attention to detail and offers everything a discerning family could wish for: an optimal room layout, lots of light, fine materials and a generous garden. The modern exterior design with clear lines in the sense of the Bauhaus style is continued in the flat.

Bright and spacious apartment on the 1st floor, south-east facing in an ecological neighborhood, perfect for a person or a couple looking for warm accommodation, furnished for a fixed period of time. 94m², on 1. floor with elevator, 1 bedroom, handicapped access, in new building , families with children welcome, smoking in apartment not allowed

Property Details
  • Lift
  • Cable TV
  • Pets permitted
  • Parking space
